rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with integrated storage and display area.

Dual-purpose living and dining area with eco-friendly materials and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on the west facade. Incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring alignment towards the east entrance.
Master bedroom featuring a built-in wardrobe, south-facing windows for optimal ventilation and balanced energy flow according to Vastu.
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light and privacy, designed following eco-friendly principles.
Dedicated home office space on the ground floor ensuring functionality and separation from the living areas. The design includes green walls to improve indoor air quality.
Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural light through north-facing windows and designed for optimal workflow according to local building norms.
Compact bathroom with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly materials.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to enhance natural lighting and ventilation.
Main entrance door designed for ease of access and security, following local building codes.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard acting as a natural light well and ventilation corridor. It features native plants to enhance the eco-friendly aspect.

balcony.description: Private balcony offering outdoor space while following Vastu guidelines for west-facing rooms.
